properties.areaDesc: Waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Hazardous Seas Warning issued January 31 at 8:42AM PST until February 1 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Hazardous Seas Warning, very steep and
hazardous seas 13 to 17 ft at 17 seconds expected. For the
Small Craft Advisory, southwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts
up to 30 kt and seas 12 to 17 ft at 17 seconds.

* WHERE...Small Craft Advisory will affect all areas. Hazardous
Seas watch will affect areas beyond 1 NM from shore with Small
Craft Advisory elsewhere.

* WHEN...For the Hazardous Seas Warning, from 10 PM this evening
to 4 PM PST Saturday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 4 PM
PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Very steep and hazardous seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Bar crossing will become especially
treacherous.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Recreational boaters should remain in port. Commercial vessels
should prepare for very steep seas and consider remaining in port
until conditions improve.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST SATURDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM PST SATURDAY
